Package com.nhn.android.maps

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FusedLocationManager.OnLocationListener
    Interface for listeners interested in the state change of location.
    NMapActivity.OnDataProviderListener
    Interface for data provider listeners.
    NMapCompassManager.OnCompassChangeListener
    Interface for listeners interested in the state change of compass.
    NMapController.OnTrafficVersionListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the traffic version of a map titles changed.
    NMapItemizedOverlay.OnFocusChangeListener
    Interface for listeners interested in when the focused Item changes.
    NMapLocationManager.OnLocationChangeListener
    Interface for listeners interested in the state change of location.
    NMapScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener
    The listener for receiving notifications when gestures occur.
    NMapTrafficVersion.OnTrafficVersionListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the traffic version of a map titles changed.
    NMapView.OnMapStateChangeListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the state of a map view changed.
    NMapView.OnMapStateChangeSimpleListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the state of a map view changed.
    NMapView.OnMapViewDelegate
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked for the map view delegate.
    NMapView.OnMapViewTouchEventListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an event of the map view handled.
    ScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener
    The listener for receiving notifications when gestures occur.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FusedLocationManager
    Location manager which implements FusedLocationListener.
    NMapActivity
    Base class with code to manage the boring necessities of any activity that displays a NMapView.
    NMapCompassManager
    Compass manager which implements SensorEventListener.
    NMapCompassManager.SensorFilter
    센서 값의 noise를 제거하기 위한 filtering 클래스.
    NMapContext
    NMapActivity를 상속하지 않는 Activity 에서는 onCreate()에서 NMapView 객체 생성전에 직접 생성해야함.
    NMapController
    A utility class to manage panning and zooming of NMapView.
    NMapGestureDetector
    Gesture detector for touch events on map view.
    NMapItemizedOverlay
    A base class for an NMapOverlay which consists of a list of NMapOverlayItems.
    NMapLibrary
    Library stuff on map view.
    NMapLocationManager
    Location manager which implements LocationListener.
    NMapOverlay
    Base class representing an overlay which may be displayed on top of a map.
    NMapOverlayItem
    The basic component of any NMapItemizedOverlay.
    NMapPanAnimation
    Panning animation on map view.
    NMapProjection
    A Projection serves to translate between the coordinate system of x/y on-screen pixel coordinates and that of latitude/longitude points on the surface of the earth.
    NMapScaleGestureDetector
    Scale gesture detector on map view.
    NMapTrackballGestureDetector
    Track-ball gesture detector on map view.
    NMapTrafficVersion
    실시간 교통 모드에서 지도 타일 업데이트 이슈 개선 - 실시간 교통 버전 조회 API를 주기적으로 조회하여 실시간 교통 버전 변경시 일정 시간 이내에 자동으로 지도 타일을 업데이트하도록 수정함 - 실시간 교통 버전 조회 API 폴링 주기는 1분에서 최대 5분
    NMapVersionWrapper
    Wrapper class to manage APIs dependent on SDK versions.
    NMapView
    A View which displays a map (with data obtained from the Naver Maps service).
    NMapView.LayoutParams
    LayoutParams for NMapView.
    NMapViewRotation
    Wrapper class to manage rotation of map view.
    NMapZoomAnimation
    Wrapper class to manage zoom animation on map view.
    ScaleGestureDetector
    Detects transformation gestures involving more than one pointer ("multitouch") using the supplied MotionEvents.
    ScaleGestureDetector.SimpleOnScaleGestureListener
    A convenience class to extend when you only want to listen for a subset of scaling-related events.
